trends: There have been no other sightings in Priestville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Very bright white looking star moving across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to enjoy our jacuzzi,then relaxing in our jacuzzi and looking at the stars,it was mostly a clear night.Then my wife said to me look at that,is that a plane.I looked and watched it for atleast 2 minutes cross the sky in a stright line.I told my wife it's not a plane it's to low and very very bright white light,a plane whould have blinking lights,Watching it cross the sky we were very carefull to watch it,we were in aww,The object went from south to north,Then after it crossed the sky a plane we saw from the north flying south blinking,And i told my wife thats a plane,I know planes travel around 5to6 hundred miles per hour and feel the bright object was alittle faster at 7oo miles per hour,The bright star thing was bigger then the brightest star in the sky and much brighter.
